summary: Moderate air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 9 October to end of Saturday 9 October GMT
description: Cloud cover will clear on Saturday morning to a dry warm day with sunny intervals.<br/><br/>A light easterly airflow is forecast, initially from the North Sea then traveling over the near continent. This may introduce some particulate pollution and levels may build during the day to reach 'moderate'.<br/><br/>Overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
